remarks: The finite sum of continuous complex function is continuous. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fsumcncf.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ CC ) $.
fsumcncf.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumcncf.cncf $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fsumcncf $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> sum_ k e. A B ) e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A k x $.
$d X k x $.
$d k ph $.
